Text:
Yeah, same here! Thank you for sharing this, has save me a load of hassle as no longer supported or upgradable.

Excellent piece of software!
This piece of shit doesn't work whatsoever.

Excellent and the best firewall, beats all others where you need to pay to get shit.

I will seed after completing.

Either has a virus or is malfunctioned: makes you unable to access the net until uninstalled.
"Allow all" doesn't help, you can't configure it in any way to re-gain access, and uhhh, my computer suddenly took 1min to open up my network connections from startup, when it usually takes about 3 sec.

Mentalbox is right. though the firewall works good, the setup file installs "a.exe" and "b.exe". God knows what these two EXEs are doing in the running programs list!! (Task manager - Processes). also the system says Shutting down, but never does.. I am trying to fix it now...
